Concept ACK

In fa6e9b84ef25b266729dd03337ae00c0ab44e52a:
> ActivateBestChain is only called in the "msghand" or one of the RPC
threads, neither of which is a boost::thread.

Is this correct? ActivateBestChain() is also called by [`ThreadImport()`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/init.cpp#L693), both directly as well via `LoadExternalBlockFile`. `ThreadImport` is run

> Is this correct? ActivateBestChain() is also called by ThreadImport(), both directly as well via LoadExternalBlockFile. ThreadImport is run in the boost::thread_group:\n\nGood catch, you are correct.
